mapper.select: SELECT SGUID , STASKNUMBER , STASKNAME , ILOCKSTATUS , DLOCKDATE , DUNLOCKDATE , IVALIDLOCKPERIOD , SREMARK , IVERSION , IDELFLAG FROM RW_TASKMANAGER WHERE IDELFLAG = 1 --AND (ILOCKSTATUS = 0 --未锁定 --OR (sysdate-DLOCKDATE)*86400 >= NVL(IVALIDLOCKPERIOD,600)) --过了锁定有效期(如果没设值有效期则默认10分钟) AND STASKNUMBER = #{sTaskNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE RW_TASKMANAGER SET ILOCKSTATUS = 0, DUNLOCKDATE = sysdate WHERE IDELFLAG = 1 AND STASKNUMBER = #{sTaskNumber}
